review.title: “Great Rewards - Opportunities for Growth”
review.pros: Pros – Total freedom to work within structure. Ability to be creative without censure. Work from home encouraged. Friendly atmosphere.
review.cons: Cons – Public Radio is not high-paying in general, but KJZA pays on a regular basis when others expect volunteerism.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep doing what you do. Maybe a staff appreciation picnic so we could all get to know each other.
